element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm creates a shaded relief image layer from a DEM.

element.name: METHOD
element.text: the method to use may be selected from the following: * Standard * Standard (max 90º) * Combined

element.name: DECLINATION
element.text: Sun elevation angle above the horizon. In degrees, and ranging from 0 to 90.

element.name: AZIMUTH
element.text: Azimuth angle of the Sun. The azimuth is expressed in positive degrees from 0 to 360, measured clockwise from north.

element.name: EXAGGERATION
element.text: Use this to exaggerate the relief and get a more dramatic effect if flat terrains.
